text: Pradeep Chapagain (Nepali: प्रदिप चापागाईँ ) is a Nepali writer. As of May 2014, he had published two Poem collections and was planning to publish a third poem collection and a ghazal album. His foundation"Jogmaya Chapagain Foundation", named after his late grandmother, was established to award two awards: an NPR 25,000-cash-prize Jogmaya ghazal award and NPR 11,111 in cash prize for meritorious graduates of a high school in Chhaimale village. He was residing in Sydney, as of 2014. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Date of birth unknown Category:Nepalese writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Pradeep Chapagain
